LanguageData.OE_Mech_Maid.label: Maid
LanguageData.OE_Mech_Maid.description: A mechanoid designed as homemaker. Lacking a ranged weapon, it can make only weak melee attacks. Maid can cleaning, cooking, hauling also rescue the wounded, fight fires, treat the sick, and even perform surgery when a more-qualified human is not available.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_Maid.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.OE_Mech_Maid.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.OE_Mech_Maid.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_Maid.tools.head-1.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_Octo.label: Octo-Bot
LanguageData.OE_Mech_Octo.description: A mechanoid designed as worker. Lacking a ranged weapon, it can make only weak melee attacks. Octo-Bot is designed to perform a large number of tasks such as construction, crafting, hauling, mining, smithing, and tailoring.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_Octo.tools.tentacle.label: tentacle
LanguageData.OE_Mech_Octo.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_Octo.tools.head-1.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OMC_Arachna.label: OMC Arachna
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OMC_Arachna.description: A medium-sized armored combat mechanoid. The creatures of the same name are taken as the basis for the design.\n\nThis model uses reconstructed OMC Assault Rifle.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OMC_Arachna.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Arachna_Acid.label: OTC Arachna(Acid)
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Arachna_Acid.description: A medium-sized armored combat mechanoid. The creatures of the same name are taken as the basis for the design.\n\nThis model uses reconstructed OTC Shotgun with Acid charges.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Arachna_Cryo.label: OTC Arachna(Cryo)
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Arachna_Cryo.description: A medium-sized armored combat mechanoid. The creatures of the same name are taken as the basis for the design.\n\nThis model uses reconstructed OTC Shotgun with Cryo charges.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Arachna_Fire.label: OTC Arachna(Fire)
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Arachna_Fire.description: A medium-sized armored combat mechanoid. The creatures of the same name are taken as the basis for the design.\n\nThis model uses reconstructed OTC Shotgun with Fire charges.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Arachna_EMP.label: OTC Arachna(EMP)
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Arachna_EMP.description: A medium-sized armored combat mechanoid. The creatures of the same name are taken as the basis for the design.\n\nThis model uses reconstructed OTC Shotgun with EMP charges.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Arachna_EMP.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OCC_Arachna.label: OCC Arachna
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OCC_Arachna.description: A medium-sized armored combat mechanoid. The creatures of the same name are taken as the basis for the design.\n\nThis model uses reconstructed OCC Rifle.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OCC_Arachna.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OEC_Arachna.label: OEC Arachna
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OEC_Arachna.description: A medium-sized armored combat mechanoid. The creatures of the same name are taken as the basis for the design.\n\nThis model uses reconstructed OEC Sniper Rifle.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OEC_Arachna.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_CAC_Arachna.label: CAC Arachna
LanguageData.OE_Mech_CAC_Arachna.description: A medium-sized armored combat mechanoid. The creatures of the same name are taken as the basis for the design.\n\nThis model uses reconstructed CAC Minigun.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_CAC_Arachna.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_ArachnaQueen.label: Arachna Queen
LanguageData.OE_Mech_ArachnaQueen.description: An ultra-tech and ultra-heavy mech with a built-in mech gestator. Fed with appropriate resources, the Arachna Queen can form small Arachna Drones combat mechs within its massive carapace and deploy them into combat.\n\nThe Arachna Queen is the avatar's replica of the deity worshiped by the Crimson Arachna Cult. The Queen's Grasp and Queen's Curse abilities help her dominate the battlefield. Even her death has consequences for her enemies.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_ArachnaQueen.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_CrimsonArachna.label: Crimson Arachna
LanguageData.OE_Mech_CrimsonArachna.description: An ultra-tech and ultra-heavy mech with a built-in mech gestator. Fed with appropriate resources, the Crimson Arachna can form small Crimson Arachna Drones combat mechs within its massive carapace and deploy them into combat.\n\nThe Crimson Arachna is the avatar of the deity worshiped by the Crimson Arachna Cult. The Queen's Grasp and Queen's Curse abilities help her dominate the battlefield. Even her death has consequences for her enemies.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_CrimsonArachna.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_ArachnaDrone.label: Arachna Drone
LanguageData.OE_Mech_ArachnaDrone.description: A small, deployable combat mechanoid usually manufactured inside an ultra-heavy Arachna Queen mech. Arachna Drone are expendable melee fighters designed to swarm-attack enemies. They are mounted with non-rechargeable power source.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_ArachnaDrone.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_ArachnaDrone.tools.head-1.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_CrimsonArachnaDrone.label: Crimson Arachna Drone
LanguageData.OE_Mech_CrimsonArachnaDrone.description: A small, deployable combat mechanoid usually manufactured inside an ultra-heavy Crimson Arachna mech. Crimson Arachna Drone are expendable melee fighters designed to swarm-attack enemies. They are mounted with non-rechargeable power source.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OMC_Dominator.label: OMC Dominator
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OMC_Dominator.description: A medium-sized well armored combat mechanoid. The Dominator series is a modern combat mechanoid designed to sow death and destruction on the battlefield.\n\nThis model with additionally mounted Rocket Launcher and uses reconstructed OMC Auto Shotgun.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OMC_Dominator.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Bullet_OMC_MRL.label: Mini's Bane MK-II rocket
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Dominator_Acid.label: OTC Dominator(Acid)
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Dominator_Acid.description: A medium-sized well armored combat mechanoid. The Dominator series is a modern combat mechanoid designed to sow death and destruction on the battlefield.\n\nThis model with additionally installed Chaos program and uses reconstructed OTC Multi-Cannon with Acid charges.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Dominator_Cryo.label: OTC Dominator(Cryo)
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Dominator_Cryo.description: A medium-sized well armored combat mechanoid. The Dominator series is a modern combat mechanoid designed to sow death and destruction on the battlefield.\n\nThis model with additionally installed Chaos program and uses reconstructed OTC Multi-Cannon with Cryo charges.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Dominator_Fire.label: OTC Dominator(Fire)
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Dominator_Fire.description: A medium-sized well armored combat mechanoid. The Dominator series is a modern combat mechanoid designed to sow death and destruction on the battlefield.\n\nThis model with additionally installed Chaos program and uses reconstructed OTC Multi-Cannon with Fire charges.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Dominator_EMP.label: OTC Dominator(EMP)
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OTC_Dominator_EMP.description: A medium-sized well armored combat mechanoid. The Dominator series is a modern combat mechanoid designed to sow death and destruction on the battlefield.\n\nThis model with additionally installed Chaos program and uses reconstructed OTC Multi-Cannon with EMP charges.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OCC_Dominator.label: OCC Dominator
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OCC_Dominator.description: A medium-sized heavy armored combat mechanoid. The Dominator series is a modern combat mechanoid designed to sow death and destruction on the battlefield.\n\nThis model with additionally installed Vanguard program and uses reconstructed OCC Drill.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OCC_Dominator.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OEC_Dominator.label: OEC Dominator
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OEC_Dominator.description: A medium-sized armored combat mechanoid. The Dominator series is a modern combat mechanoid designed to sow death and destruction on the battlefield.\n\nThis model with additionally installed Blink device and uses reconstructed OEC Bow.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OEC_Dominator.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_ODC_Dominator_Light.label: ODC Dominator(Light)
LanguageData.OE_Mech_ODC_Dominator_Light.description: A medium-sized armored combat mechanoid. The Dominator series is a modern combat mechanoid designed to sow death and destruction on the battlefield.\n\nThis model with additionally installed Camouflage device and uses reconstructed ODC Claws.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_ODC_Dominator_Heavy.label: ODC Dominator(Heavy)
LanguageData.OE_Mech_ODC_Dominator_Heavy.description: A medium-sized heavy armored combat mechanoid. The Dominator series is a modern combat mechanoid designed to sow death and destruction on the battlefield.\n\nThis model with additionally installed Provoke program and uses reconstructed heavy ODC Blade Launcher.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OMG_Dominator.label: Mercenary Dominator
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OMG_Dominator.description: Highly modified medium-sized heavy armored combat mechanoid. The Dominator series is a modern combat mechanoid designed to sow death and destruction on the battlefield.\n\nThis model uses reconstructed heavy OMG Shotgun, Sniper Rifle or Minigun.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_OMG_Dominator.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_ChaosLord.label: Chaos Lord
LanguageData.OE_Mech_ChaosLord.description: Chaos Lord is a prototype based on the Dominator, a medium-sized well-armored mechanoid. Originally designed as a combat mechandroid, tests revealed significantly improved results, leading to their use as assassins. Additionally, they can use the enhanced abilities of the Dominators.\n\nUses specially designed unique Grand Proton Rifle.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_ChaosLord.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.OE_Mech_ChaosLord.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.OE_Mech_ChaosLord.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_FallenLegion.label: Fallen Legion
LanguageData.OE_Mech_FallenLegion.description: An ultra-tech, ultra-armored, fortress-sized mechanoid with a built-in mech gestator. Fed with appropriate resources, the Fallen Legion can form medium Fallen Legion Guards combat mechs. Fallen Legion is a unknown development model based on the Dominator. Designed for suppression of enemies and total control of the battlefield.\n\nUses specially designed gun-spear Fallen Legion Spear and mounted with 4 Legion Beam Turret.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_FallenLegion.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_LegionGuard.label: Fallen Legion Guard
LanguageData.OE_Mech_LegionGuard.description: An ultra-tech and ultra-armored medium-sized mechanoid with a built-in mech gestator. Fed with appropriate resources, the Fallen Legion Guard can form small Fallen Legion Drones combat mechs. Fallen Legion Guard are deployable combat mechanoid usually manufactured inside an ultra-tech Fallen Legion mech. They are mounted with non-rechargeable power source.\n\nUses specially designed gun-spear Fallen Legion Guard Spear.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_LegionGuard.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_LegionDrone.label: Fallen Legion Drone
LanguageData.OE_Mech_LegionDrone.description: A small, deployable combat mechanoid usually manufactured inside an ultra-tech Fallen Legion Guard mech. Fallen Legion Drone are expendable melee fighters designed to swarm-attack enemies. They are mounted with non-rechargeable power source.
LanguageData.OE_Mech_LegionDrone.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Mech_LegionDrone.tools.head-1.label: head
LanguageData.CAC_Swarmling_Drone.label: Cultist Swarmling Drone
LanguageData.CAC_Swarmling_Drone.description: Cultist Swarmling Drone - small autonomous mechanoid built for efficient elimination. Swarmling Drones are powered by a long-lasting battery.
LanguageData.CAC_Swarmling_Drone.tools.stinger.label: stinger
LanguageData.OMG_Swarmling_Drone.label: Mercenary Swarmling Drone
LanguageData.OMG_Swarmling_Drone.description: Mercenary Swarmling Drone - small autonomous mechanoid built for efficient elimination. Swarmling Drones are powered by a long-lasting battery.
LanguageData.OMG_Swarmling_Drone.tools.stinger.label: stinger
